description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Lamb With Charred Broccoli & Mint Chimichurri recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,Broccolini,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grilled Lamb With Charred Broccoli & Mint Chimichurri Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g orange sweet potato, cut into wedges
2 bunch broccolini, thick stems halved diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Steam or microwave potato until just tender. Drain. Spray potato and broccolini with oil. Drizzle 1 tbs oil over lamb.
Heat a large chargrill over high heat. Cook lamb, potatoes and broccolini, turning, for 5 minutes or until lamb is cooked to your liking and vegetables are charred and tender.

Meanwhile, place mint, parsley, garlic and chilli in a food processor. Process until finely chopped. Add vinegar and remaining oil. Process until combined. Season. Serve lamb with charred vegetables and chimichurri.
